title: Dog Hunt!
body:
Welcome all,

This is a mini-game, called Wolf Hunt!,

Basically a quick review:

Dog hunt! is a game where you need 5 people on each team (10 in total) who run around the jungle only and hunt each other.

Rules:
You can farm jungle
You can fight anyone 1v1,1v2,1v3,1v4,1v5 (there is no rule against this)
You can take dragon, baron and jungle monsters.
You can not buy 1 trinket (oracle) as it reveals enemies who are trying to sneek around the jungle.
A ward is fine as you can spot enemy intruders running around near your ward.
A Lens sweaper is fine to remove those wards if spotted.

Summoners:
Smite, Flash, Ghost, Teleport, Ignite <-- These are the only necessary summoners you need for this game.
Heal, Clarity, Clarvoyance etc <--- banned

Draft Pick:
The game mode is in a draft pick so you can ban those champions you do not like, or counter your hunting skills.
Max bans: 3

Upon Starting:
Stay together and run around the jungle, no presence is shown in any lanes, you can base at any stage of the game, if you are caught and die you can respawn and continue playing, if you are caught and get away, then you are a (wounded wolf) which means youve been spotted and are weak to the enemy who will hunt you down, but if you have based by then, your title is removed (the wounded wolf).

Granted Titles:
Wounded Wolf: when you are hit or attacked by an enemy player.
The Wounded Wolf: when you are recalling after a fight (and or in base), after leaving base its removed.

Titles:
Alpha Wolf: This is earned by having the most kills and having no deaths at the end of the match.
Night Hunter: This is earned by stalking a player and chasing them to their death, and or fighting them to their death.
Trap Expert: This is earned by catching a kill or an assist from a player caught in your traps.
Stunning Slayer: This is earned by having 5 stun champions on 1 team killing 1 or more players with all stuns.
Branded to Death: This is earned by Brand (Champion) Killing 5 enemies with his ult only.
Sudden Death: This is earned by a champion (who was not spotted) who dies.
Invulnrable: This is earned by killing 5 people without recalling once.
Unstoppable: This is earned by killing 4 people without recalling once.
Deadly: This is earned by killing 3 people without recalling once.
Twin-Fang: This is earned by killing 2 players with only one player.
Sniffed You Out: This is earned by finding 5 enemy players grouped in one spot with one ward.
Sniffer Caught: This is earned by killing the player who found the team grouped with the ward.
Dragon Slayer: This is earned by killing the Dragon before 2 minutes (team or solo effort).
Baron's Grace: This is earned by killing Baron Nashor with 1 -5 players before 25 minutes.
Welcome to Dog Hunt!: Everyone earns this at the start.

Random In-game game:
When the Alpha is called ( by having 5 or more kills with no deaths) every player on their team will /ALL ALPHA WOLF in the chat to the enemy team signaling the enemy team can now leave jungle and can defend against the Alpha wolf's Charge: When the alpha wolf is called in chat you all rush to the middle lane and charge down that lane (with minions) and siege 5 man with your Alpha wolf (Protecting the Alpha and dieing for him). If the Alpha dies you may continue to finish the game by killing the nexus or fighting the enemy back in the middle lane only.

Victory Screen:
Your team has won with your Alpha guiding you all to victory, but be warned there may be another Alpha to take their place next time.

Defeat Screen:
Your team has lost against the Alpha, you must reuinite as a team and become the Alpha Team and lead your team to Victory next time.

How does the game end?:
The game ends when one of your team mates have reached Alpha Wolf, Then you have to siege down 1 lane as a team and claim victory for your Alpha Leader. (Title is not removed once this phase is started and/or completed.

How are Titles Tracked?:
Titles are tracked by you souly, keep in mind what titles you may have already (notepad them down if needed or say them in chat) e.g. XPlayer: I AM (Title) I AM THE (Title). This is not tracked in real-time or during the game, It is a reward system to grant you titles etc during the game, but you have to remember what your title is perferably note it down somewhere, or use this page to indicate your title reference.

What if we kill dragon too late?:
You are granted Kin's of the Dragon: you are eligible to recieve the dragon buff without title-ship (this is not a title, so you cannot add it to your list).

What if we kill baron?:
You get a title Baron's Heroes: A non title same as dragons Kin of the Dragon. (you can not add this as a title)

How long does a game take?:
Depends who gets Alpha first and pushes to the enemy nexus first.

This is still in Alpha, but feel free to add some comments down below and if you are interested in this game i can personally play with you in-game (as the creator of Dog Hunt!

IGN: Doom Bot Darius

Feel free to message me in game, and play it (ON OCE FOR ALPHA, ON ALL SERVERS WHEN LIVE)
